title: Mixmax
description:
Mixmax is the easiest-to-use sales engagement platform. Mixmax helps reps engage hard-to-reach buyers with personalized, multi-channel sequences, email tracking and templates, calendaring, and engaging email enhancements like polls and surveys. They save time by working from their inbox instead of switching tabs, and automating repetitive tasks like Salesforce updates. 

Find out why 90,000+ active users love Mixmax today!
